name: Be Kind. Rewind.
description:
You have a VHS tape that is over due at the Video Store. Also, it's years after the apocalypse wiped everything out and this is the only video store left in the world. If you don't return the tape in time, they will revoke your rental card! Better fight through the hordes of monsters and collect their DNA to get stronger in order to make it back to the video store before they close.

Made this in about 72 hours. Not quite the way I wanted it to turn out, but I finished what I could.
